name: Jujutsu Kaisen
description: An anime about curses, and by far the best one this season

name: Re Zero
description: An Isekai show where the protagonist Subaru revives

name: Dr. Stone
description: Highschooler Senku is a scientific genius, but one day, a mysterious light eradicates civilaziation. Senku is the first human to awake after 2000 years.

name: Naruto
description: A Shonen anime staged in a Ninja world. Naruto is a ninja growing up in Konoha.

name: Boruto
description: A sequel to the popular Naruto franchise.

name: Kimetsu
description: A Shonen anime where demons `Oni` roam around the world, and protagonist Tanjiro gets his whole family, except his younger sister, killed by a demon. Although his sister Nezuko is alive, she turns into a demon as well.
